english_translation: Abd al-Rahman narrated to us, he said: Ibrahim narrated to us, he said: Adam narrated to us, he said: Warqa' narrated to us, from Ibn Abi Najih, from Ma'qil ibn Abi Miskin, regarding His saying: 'Indeed, those who disbelieve in the verses of Allah and kill the prophets without right and kill those who order justice from among the people' (Surah Al Imran, verse 21), he said: 'A prophet from the Children of Israel would receive revelation but not receive a book, so he would stand and remind his people, and be killed. Then men from among those who followed him and believed him would stand and remind them, and they would be killed. So they are those who order justice from among the people.'
